entities.name: ron
entities.description: The text describes Ron as being hurried across the entrance hall and down the stone steps. He is also mentioned to be talking with Harry and attempting to put on his robes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as pointing out encouraging factors to Ron as they walked towards the stadium.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as having changed already and talking to the rest of the team when Harry and Ron entered.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is mentioned as helping Ron with his robes.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are walking together towards the stadium.
Harry sees Angelina talking to the rest of the team when they enter.
Ron interacts with Alicia while attempting to put on his robes.
